document_data.caption: A map showing Tesh Street in southeast Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Tesh Street
document_data.ends: Eastern gate of the [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Tesh Street''' was a small road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Tesh Street was located in Zhentil Keep's [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]] in the southeastern section of the city. The road branched west off of the [[Street of Sorrow]] and terminated several blocks later at the eastern gate to the [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]].
document_data.Notable Locations: A [[Zhentilar]] guardpost was located along Tesh Street.
